job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Your OpportunitybrbrWe are looking for a curious optimistic and innovative data scientist who takes initiative to solve problems that help our clients and one another succeed Our large client base and multichannel transaction volume offers a fertile data environment to build models discover new insights and guide decisionmaking at SchwabbrbrData Science is an enterprise team within the Data Analytics and Insight DAI organization that builds models and provides advanced analytical support across all business units including retail institutional marketing digital and operations Our data scientists collaborate directly with business product technology and other analytical teams in DAI to solve complex business problems by building stateoftheart models and tools to grow the business streamline costs and improve customer experiencesbrbrWhat you are good atbrulliApply critical thinking skills and advanced analytics to solve complex business problemsliliTranslate business partners needs into data science projects and help prioritize opportunities based on expected business impact and execution complexityliliDrive projects individually or collaboratively through the data science lifecycle including data collection explorationanalysis model development validation and deploymentliliSeek build and consolidate data inputs proactively to create and improve modelsliliValidate document and review models with governance and risk stakeholders to ensure they do not cause excessive risk to the companyliliDevelop presentations to communicate key messages to senior sponsors nontechnical partners and other stakeholdersliliCollaborate with peers and colleagues to continuously improve the teams capabilitiesbrliulWhat you havebrbrstronguTechnical SkillsbrustrongulliQuantitative Foundation BS degree in a quantitative field eg Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Economics Mathematics Operations Research EngineeringliliProgramming compose clean understandable and reproducible code in Python andor RliliMachine Learning  Modeling understand what types of algorithms to use their benefits and drawbacks and how to implement themliliData Wrangling write efficient SQL queries from scratch that blend data from dozens of sources in the right form for modeling analysis and scoringliliStatistical Analysis design research approaches to investigate trends patterns and relationships using statistical methods and tests to reach actionable conclusions and understand causal relationshipsliliData visualization grasp dataink ratios and bring datadriven stories to life through visualsbrliulstronguSoft SkillsbrustrongulliCurious bring intellectual curiosity an inquisitive nature and a desire to deepen your knowledge and continue learningliliBusiness acumen understand the bigger picture for customers and the business and how to connect your work to key objectives for the organizationliliStorytelling write and present messages and insights clearly to persuade nontechnical partners that they can confidently use our models and solutionsliliOwnership take responsibility to proactively advance projects contribute to the organization and develop the best solutionsbrliulstronguBonus Points If You Havebrustrongulli35 years of progressive data science experienceliliA graduate degree Masters or PhD in a quantitative fieldliliExperience deploying models into production liliProficiency using git for version control collaboration and releasesliliFamiliarity with Google Cloud Platform GCP andor DataikuliliWorking knowledge of Spark PySparkliliFinancial services experience or passion to understand the industrybrliulWhy work for usbrbrOwn Your Tomorrow embodies everything we do We are committed to helping our
